label: pathology department review (surgical pathology reports, autopsies, or cytology reports)
description: Pathology Department Review (surgical pathology reports, autopsies, or cytology reports)

label: daily discharge review (daily screening of charts of discharged patients in the medical records department)
description: Daily Discharge Review (daily screening of charts of discharged patients in the medical records department)

label: disease index review (review of disease index in the medical records department)
description: Disease Index Review (review of disease index in the medical records department)

label: laboratory reports (other than pathology reports, code 20)
description: Laboratory Reports (other than pathology reports, code 20)

label: diagnostic imaging/radiology (other than radiation therapy, codes 23; includes nuclear medicine)
description: Diagnostic Imaging/Radiology (other than radiation therapy, codes 23; includes nuclear medicine)

label: other hospital source (including clinic, nos or outpatient department, nos)
description: Other Hospital Source (including clinic, NOS or outpatient department, NOS)

label: consultation-only or pathology-only report (not abstracted by reporting hospital)
description: Consultation-only or Pathology-only Report (not abstracted by reporting hospital)

label: managed care organization (mco) or insurance records
description: Managed Care Organization (MCO) or Insurance Records

label: death certificate (case identified through death clearance)
description: Death Certificate (case identified through death clearance)

label: quality control review (case initially identified through quality control activities such as casefinding audit of a regional or central registry)
description: Quality Control Review (case initially identified through quality control activities such as casefinding audit of a regional or central registry)
